item.title: Answer key - Python-Pixel
item.description: Activity1 This is the sample answer for creating a blue color board with width 100 and height 100. from PIL import Image width=100 height=100 color='blue' img = Image.new('RGB', (width, height), color) img.save('pixel-activity1.png') Activity2 This is the sample answer to draw a line from the middle of the color board from Activity1 to its bottom right corner. initial_position_x = 50 initial_position_y = 50 width = 100 height = 100 color = (0,0,0) #make change here while initial_position_x < width: while initial_position_y < height: img.
